visibilityRule.booleanFilter: 1 AND ( 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8)

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
New Leaders has a Salesforce-based record and approval process for contracts and procurements with external people and organizations. All cash in and out of the organization must be recorded as a contract (cash-in) or procurement (cash-out; i.e. when New Leaders is purchasing goods or services).


Please refer to our official procurement policy and FAQ for any information around specific scenarios.

Procuring a hotel meeting space for a conference or purchasing outside consulting services are examples of procurements. Signing a contract with a district that will be paying for a New Leaders program is a common example of a contract. Once entered into Salesforce according to this process, the information is formally reviewed and approved by our Legal, Finance, Program Implementation, and/or E-Team.



Contracts and Procurements
